oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show (Office of Price Stabilization) - Programs 16 & 17
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple recordings of the Hank Thompson radio show promoted by the Office of Price Stabilization. Labeled as program 16 and program 17. Original broadcast date unknown. Backed by his Brazos Valley Boys of Amos Hendrick on fiddle (mentioned), Lefty Nason on steel guitar (presumably, not mentioned) and Billy Stewart on bass (presumably, not mentioned).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (00:41) Cryin' in the Deep Blue Sea (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (02:47) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (03:54) Roses Have Thorns (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (06:28) Farther on Down the Road [featuring Billy Gray vocals] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (09:14) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (10:04) Sagebrush Shuffle (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (11:39) That Beautiful Picture (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (13:50) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (14:46) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] -- (15:22) I Ain't Cryin' Over You (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (16:54) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (17:58) Don't Make Me Cry Again (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (20:34) Gonna Rock this Joint Tonight (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (22:39) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (23:33) Devil's Dream (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (26:01) When God Dips His Love in my Heart (Hank Thompson and His Bravos Valley Boys) -- (28:15) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys)
